okay, for you dumbasses who don't know, or just taking a stupid guess at how fake this movie is, I'm gonna tell you the whole thing, cause I have seen "Fact of Fiction" once before, and 40% "Faces of Death" is fake. the other 60% is real (duhh). 25% of it contains animal attacks or animals attacking animals. The other 35% shows human death that occur on spot, or caught on video (IE: Vietnam's Nuclear Attack, Man on fire).
